column1: Kata Robata////Tried this place for the first time tonight. What a great spot!! Service was great
column3: they were both so good!!! We had the Kobe beef dish
column5: kind of something you can't skip on it you come here. We also got the lobster Mac n cheese
column6: which is another staple you can't pass on
column7: delish!!! We did get the green tea cheesecake
column8: which we didn't care for. We also got the coffee and donuts dessert
column9: which tasted wonderful! Looking forward to visiting again!
